summary: The future vision of UOST - The intention of Unicorn Service Co, Ltd is to create a reliable digital currency in a financial infrastructure with the UOST (Uniports online Shopping Token). This infrastructure will facilitate the global internet shopping experience and payment for services in the future. The world needs a digital currency that can collectively deliver on the promise of an "internet shopping money." It should be easy and innovative to secure assets via mobile device. Sending money worldwide can be inexpensive and even more secure than sending a text message or a photo, no matter where you live, what you do (even for a living), or how much you earn. Through creative products and new participants in the ecosystem, it will be possible in the future to lower access restrictions and the cost of raising capital for everyone, as well as allow multiple people to make payments easily.
